job_title: Business Analyst - Product Owner with Pharma knowledge
jd: From: sunny, Source Infotech Inc sunny@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: sunny@sourceinfotech.com Hi,Hope you are all doing well,Please find the details of Requirement,Business Analyst / Product Owner with Pharma knowledge3 months with possible extensions**FULLY REMOTE (CST only)**Visa- No Cpt/Opt/H1B Job Summary:This role involves managing multiple projects with a focus on delivering high-quality outcomes.Lead the planning and implementation of projects to ensure timely delivery and alignment with business objectives. - Oversee project scope, goals, and deliverables, ensuring they meet stakeholder expectations. - Provide direction and support to project teams, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment. - Utilize Agile Methodologies to manage project timelines, resources, and deliverables effectively. - Conduct regular status meetings with project teams to monitor progress and address any issues. - Facilitate requirements gathering sessions to ensure all project requirements are clearly defined and documented. - Use Jira to track project progress, manage tasks, and communicate updates to stakeholders. - Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, and resource allocation. - Identify and mitigate risks throughout the project lifecycle to ensure successful project outcomes. - Ensure all project documentation is complete, current, and stored appropriately. - Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure project dependencies are managed and deliverables are met. - Provide regular project updates to senior management and other stakeholders to keep them informed of progress. - Evaluate project performance and implement improvements to enhance future project outcomes. Experience: 5-8 yrs Required Skills:1. Customer Expectation Mgmt.2. Agile Methodologies, Requirements Gathering, and Jira3. Product Backlog Grooming and User Stories Creation4. Pharma Knowledge is must. Thanks,SunnyIT RecruiterSource InfoTech Inc.,Email: sunny@sourceinfotech.com
